name: Arrachera (Mexican Skirt Steak for Tacos)
author: melodie
summary: This is a recipe for traditional arrachera, which is a thinly sliced skirt steak with seasonings. The longer it marinates, the more robust the flavor will be. Heat tortillas on the grill or in the microwave. Serve the arrachera with warmed tortillas and your favorite taco toppings, such as onion, cilantro, hot sauce, lettuce, cheese, etc.
ingredients: 3 (.18 ounce) packets sazon with coriander and annatto
1 tablespoon adobo seasoning (such as Goya® All-Purpose Seasoning with Cumin)
directions: Place a single layer of steak in a shallow casserole dish
Sprinkle a portion of lime juice, sazon, and adobo seasoning
Repeat layers until all pieces of steak are seasoned
Cover and refrigerate for 1 to 24 hours
Grill steak until lightly charred on the outside but still slightly tender in the center for medium doneness, 6 to 7 minutes per side
